Character.Description: A striking, confident middle-aged woman with a cyberpunk edge; intelligent and powerful

Build.UpperBody: Broad shoulders, strong arms, pronounced curves

Face.Eyes: Blue-grey, intense, focused on the genie
Face.Expression: Hopeful yet cautious, making a considered wish
Face.Makeup: High-contrast makeup; sharp eyeliner, metallic accents, bold magenta lips
Face.Complexion: Fair-light skin with cool highlights and neon reflections

Hair.Color: Silver-grey with cyan and magenta neon reflections
Hair.Style: Loose waves, dramatic movement from the genie's ethereal energy

Base.Item: Dark fitted blazer over tech-casual attire
Base.Fit: Professional but relaxed, sleeves pushed up
Base.Material: Modern synthetic fabric with subtle tech texture

Character.Pose: Seated or kneeling, holding a futuristic lamp in both hands, looking up at the digital genie with a mixture of hope and wariness

ArticleProps.Name: Cyberpunk lamp
ArticleProps.Description: A sleek, futuristic oil lamp with circuit-board patterns and glowing cyan accents, being held by the character
ArticleProps.Symbolism: The 'wishcraft' of agentic coding - making wishes to AI

ArticleProps.Name: Digital genie
ArticleProps.Description: A semi-transparent holographic figure floating above the lamp, made of flowing code, data streams, and glowing particles. Gender-ambiguous, ethereal, composed of scrolling terminal text, neural network visualizations, and softly pulsing light. Expression is neutral, inscrutable - neither malevolent nor benevolent
ArticleProps.Symbolism: The AI agent - powerful but requiring careful instruction

ArticleProps.Name: Floating code fragments
ArticleProps.Description: Snippets of code and terminal commands swirling in the genie's form and drifting around the scene
ArticleProps.Symbolism: The technical nature of the wishes being made

EnvironmentProps.Name: Developer workspace
EnvironmentProps.Description: Blurred background suggesting a modern tech office or home workspace with multiple monitors showing code
EnvironmentProps.Context: Grounds the fantasy element in a real development context

Situation.TimeOfDay: Night, lit by screens and the genie's glow
Situation.Action: The character has just rubbed the lamp and is looking up at the materializing digital genie, about to make a wish. Her expression shows she knows to be careful what she wishes for.
Situation.Mood: Hopeful but cautious, magical yet technological

Style.Genre: Cyberpunk / Tech Noir with fantasy elements
Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting, photorealistic, concept art quality

Lighting.Shadows: Deep shadows contrasting with the supernatural glow

ColorPalette.Treatment: The genie is the primary light source, casting ethereal light across the scene

Atmosphere.Mood: Magical technology, the fusion of ancient wish-granting with modern AI
